tool_description: The service returns similar words to words that you enter.  It can be helpful for finding new keywords, adding tags, etc.  Of particular use is the ability to take as input multiple words - for example, "apple pear" returns fruits, but "apple microsoft" returns tech companies.
name: Similar Words
title: Similar Words

api_list.name: /moar

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: this is the query parameter. words are separated by space ' ', and some words can be joined by an ascii dash -, e.g. new-york
